divs: sighting detailswent outside at 6:15pm on 03\10\11. looked toward the sky to the west and noticed commercial airplane on usual flight path for a landing at airport in ontario, calif. noticed very bright white light above and to the right of airplane. it was in the distance when i first noticed it, moving eastward about 1\4 mile behind and north of plane. bright light continued to follow as the plane flew east toward the cajon pass (i 15). the planes always pass south of our house, but the bright light came directly over our house and continued to follow the plane when plane turned south over the cajon pass and into the city. as the plane and the light passed between the mountains and into the city the bright light faded away as if the lights were turned off on the craft. i noted that as the plane flew past our house i could hear it's engines but the bright light made no sound, even though it was closer and passed directly above my house.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Victorville
There were no other sightings in Victorville on or around March 10th 2011
